text: Daoud may refer to: * David in Islam * Dawud of Kanem, the half-brother of the 14th-century Kanem emperor Idris I of Kanem * Mohammed Daoud (1901–1984), governor of the province of Helmand in Afghanistan * Mohammed Daoud Khan (1909–1978), 1st President of Afghanistan * Ignatius Moses I Daoud (1930–2012), Cardinal Patriarch Emeritus of Antioch * Hichem Daoud (born 1992), Algerian handball player * Daoud Kuttab (born 1955), Pakistani journalist ==See also== * Dawud (disambiguation) * David (name)
title: Daoud
